description.narrative: 3. Provide integrated conditional & unconditional food assistance packages to vulnerable households

sector.narrative: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round

title.narrative: Number of social infrastructures and Income Generating infrastructures rehabilitated (School Building, Facility Center, Community Building, Market Stalls, etc.)
